remarks: Adding additional properties to the set of walks (as words) of a fixed length starting at a fixed vertex.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Aug-2018.)
statement:
wwlkextprop.x $e |- X = ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` ( N + 1 ) ) $.
wwlkextprop.y $e |- Y = { w e. ( ( V WWalksN E ) ` N ) | ( w ` 0 ) = P } $.
wwlkextprop $p |- ( N e. NN0 -> { x e. X | ( x ` 0 ) = P } = { x e. X | E. y e. Y ( ( x substr <. 0 , ( N + 1 ) >. ) = y /\ ( y ` 0 ) = P /\ { ( lastS ` y ) , ( lastS ` x ) } e. ran E ) } ) $.
$d E w y $.
$d N w x y $.
$d P w y $.
$d V w $.
$d X y $.
$d Y y $.
